SELECT g.id,g.cart_type,g.count,g.price,g.goods_id, (select a.`name` from ezs_goods a where a.id = g.goods_id) gname, gs.inventory, gs.area_id gAreaId, CONCAT("http://m.ezaisheng.com/",REPLACE(ga.path,'\\','/'),"/",ga.`name`) picturePath, d.name utilName, a2.areaName FROM ezs_goodscart g LEFT JOIN ezs_goods gs on g.goods_id = gs.id LEFT JOIN ezs_accessory ga on gs.goods_main_photo_id = ga.id LEFT JOIN ezs_dict d on gs.util_id = d.id LEFT JOIN ezs_area a2 on gs.area_id = a2.id WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ezs_storecart s WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.deleteStatus = '0' and s.sc_status = '0' AND s.id = g.sc_id) AND g.deleteStatus = '0' and ISNULL(g.of_id) limit #{pageCount},#{pagesize}
